data.name: 洞主
data.text: 我都傻了，自觉打码星号变成了加粗可还行（下次注意预览

post.text:
#随心情更的音乐bot#
I told my mom I was gay, why the f*** she ain't listen?
I signed a pub deal and her opinion f***** disappearin'
I'm payin' bills for my sister and tryna fund her business
Is it homophobic to only hook up with straight n****s?
You know, like closet n****s, masc-type
Why don't you take that mask off? That's the thought I had last night
Why you always rap about bein' gay?
'Cause not enough n****s rappin' be gay
Where I come from n****s get called "faggot" and killed
So I'ma get head from a n**** right here
And they can come and cut my hand off and
And my legs off and
And I'ma still be a boss 'til my head go, yeah
——"JUNKY", BROCKHAMPTON
（说好的周中更一次周末更两次，结果周中=周五，可还行…）本来想写点网络音乐相关的…看了一下今晚树洞决定换一下吧。本条只表明态度不开放政治讨论。
不过倒也不算偏离太多，毕竟这个团体的结识还是典型的互联网粉丝行为。以后有时间多介绍一下这个自比新一代One Direction的嘻哈男团。
链接：https://music.163.com/#/song?id=502242128
上一期：#75241
